entry.title: His Dancer
entry.summary:
Author: potato_saladisass

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,890Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Everyone's heard of him by now. How could they not? The Iceberg Lounge getting a new owner was news in of itself. That new owner being Jason Todd... as in Bruce Wayne's second ward who mysteriously disappeared, *that* Jason Todd? The one and only. And he's only inherited Brucie Wayne's flair for the public, all while dominating his business.He's sloppy, but charming. Always has an answer for everything. especially whatever hardball question thrown at him by the press. But no one truly knows what happens behind his office doors.Not even you. You're just some paid escort for the night. To sit by his side and hang off his arm... and to be quiet. You're a usual dancer at the Lounge, but this hardly seems like a promotion despite what the money may tell you. You've been sitting with him for an hour now, being gawked at by his associated like some prize to be won.

entry.title: Loathing. (A Dick Grayson/Reader/Jason Todd Story)
entry.summary:
Author: men_written_by_women_enthusiast

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,625Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 41

Summary: You had a good life. You got an acceptance letter to Gotham University. You had a second family you could visit whenever that also consisted of undercover vigilantes. You had a best friend.Jason Todd.But he died.No, he didn't die, he was murdered.You also had a very close friend that you bonded with over the event, Dick Grayson.Now that you're a vigilante yourself years later, what are you going to do when the once murdered Jason enters your life again?‚Äî¬∞.‚ãÜ ìÜ∞ìÜ™ ‚ãÜ.¬∞‚ÄîHey there! Few warnings. ONE, this is not a poly fic. This is what I would call a love V, not a complete triangle. Two fighting for the one (yourself). There will be canon-adjacent action and gore. There will be slight angst (duh), and eventual smut if my reader base would like it. Once I am done with writing, there will be two separate chapter endings for which of the brothers you would wish to choose. I'm on a DC kick! I can't wait to delve into more Batfamily content <3Spotify playlist, loves, as per usual <3https://open.spotify.com/playlist/6wTG76ZwrNE5yqYHLpPf0W?si=SxTk-fMPTNSavQQ0T3Tz1wPinterest inspo boardhttps://pin.it/4RqYCtntO

entry.title: Good Luck, Babe.
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 54,119Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 240

Summary: Born as the heir to a dirty fortune and nothing more, since you could walk you‚Äôve known you‚Äôd marry someone for the sake of carrying on your family‚Äôs legacy. Trying to find love was never forbidden‚Äïit was simply out of the question. There was no point in finding it when you were betrothed to a complete stranger. As the prized and only daughter of Roman Sionis, otherwise known as the infamous crime lord Black Mask, what choice was there to make?Mafia boss Bruce Wayne strikes a deal with your father‚Äïjoin your two incredibly powerful and wealthy families by marrying off the soul heirs. That would be you, and Bruce Wayne‚Äôs adopted ‚Äògolden son,‚Äô Richard Grayson.The first time you meet Dick, he‚Äôs nothing short of a typical rich kid. Polite in all the ways that mattered, a little arrogant and a little flashy for your taste, but cute nonetheless. But when you meet Dick‚Äôs bodyguard, Jason Todd‚Äïa reformed criminal paying off his debt to the Wayne‚Äôs‚Äïeverything changes. Jason is handsome, aloof, dangerous, everything you aren‚Äôt allowed to have.And now, he‚Äôs suddenly everything you want.

entry.title: O, Weaver of Lazarus
entry.summary:
Author: fyodvvr

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,263Chapters: 1/35Kudos: 4

Summary: 3 years after making a deal with a disabled man you end up rediscovering the field of medicine. While seeking to recover from permanent amnesia you find yourself transferred from a local ER to Gotham's General Hospital - the life you thought you had established crumbles.Unlike most people your everyday life is filled with strings, though unlike the ones in books, which tie soulmates together, you view people's soul strings as they shift, tangle, coil within, or unwind from their bodies.With strange dreams becoming more frequent you slowly come to learn more about your past self and the things you've done. Along the way you meet... people, strange though they are you can't shake the creeping feeling of having met them before and neither can they. Will you come to remember before it is too late? Or will you succumb to madness trying to?
